name: aws-serverless-express-example
description: Example application for running a Node Express app on AWS Lambda using Amazon API Gateway.

scripts.invoke-lambda: aws lambda invoke --function-name AwsServerlessExpressFunction --region $npm_package_config_region --payload file://api-gateway-event.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.delete-bucket: aws s3 rm s3://$npm_package_config_s3BucketName/lambda-function.zip --region $npm_package_config_region; aws s3 rm s3://$npm_package_config_s3BucketName/simple-proxy-api.yaml --region $npm_package_config_region; aws s3 rb s3://$npm_package_config_s3BucketName --region $npm_package_config_region
scripts.package-function: zip -q -r lambda-function.zip lambda.js app.js index.html node_modules
scripts.package-upload-function: npm run package-function && npm run upload-function
scripts.upload-update-function: npm run upload-function && npm run update-function
scripts.package-upload-update-function: npm run package-upload-function && npm run update-function
scripts.setup: npm install && aws s3api get-bucket-location --bucket $npm_package_config_s3BucketName --region $npm_package_config_region || npm run create-bucket && npm run package-upload-function && npm run upload-api-gateway-swagger && npm run create-stack
scripts.win-invoke-lambda: aws lambda invoke --function-name AwsServerlessExpressFunction --region %npm_package_config_region% --payload file://api-gateway-event.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.win-delete-bucket: aws s3 rm s3://%npm_package_config_s3BucketName%/lambda-function.zip --region %npm_package_config_region%; aws s3 rm s3://%npm_package_config_s3BucketName%/simple-proxy-api.yaml --region %npm_package_config_region%; aws s3 rb s3://%npm_package_config_s3BucketName% --region %npm_package_config_region%
scripts.win-package-function: 7z a lambda-function.zip -r lambda.js app.js index.html node_modules
scripts.win-package-upload-function: npm run win-package-function && npm run win-upload-function
scripts.win-upload-update-function: npm run win-upload-function && npm run win-update-function
scripts.win-package-upload-update-function: npm run win-package-upload-function && npm run win-update-function
scripts.win-setup: npm install && aws s3api get-bucket-location --bucket %npm_package_config_s3BucketName% --region %npm_package_config_region% || npm run win-create-bucket && npm run win-package-upload-function && npm run win-upload-api-gateway-swagger && npm run win-create-stack
